content: place weave in loose ends and trim the remaining ends repeat all steps for the second mitt wet block if desired * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *please don t hesitate to message me on ravelry if you find any issues with the pattern * kelly meneely@gmail com www thecaffeinatedewe com tag your projects #easygarterstitchmitts #thecaffeinatedeweshop ***feel free to make as many cowls as you like for personal gifting or charitable use please do not sell the pattern and please always provide attribution and a link to the corresponding ravelry pattern page when selling items made from my patterns *** * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * © 2011 2022 easy garter stitch mitts by kelly meneely the caffeinated ewe designs 2
